channel.title: Hacker News - English
channel.description: Hacker News articles summarized and translated to English

item.title: Computer Science Courses That Don't Exist, but Should (2015)
item.description:
It's about being able to implement your ideas. CSCI 2170: User Experience of Command Line Tools An introduction to UX principles as applied to command line programs designed as class projects. Programming Without Being Obsessed With Programming and Organizational Skills Beat Algorithmic Wizardry are good starting points.

Read more

item.title: /dev/null is an ACID compliant database
item.description:
" Anything you write to /dev/null disappears entirely. /dev/null always stays in a consistent state (empty). /dev/null "durably" commits your data into nothingness.

Read more

item.title: How memory maps (mmap) deliver faster file access in Go
item.description:
The Downside of Memory Maps The downside of memory maps is that you really can't write to the memory map. Still, writing through memory maps, was what Varnish Cache did initially. com/perbu/mmaps-in-go CDB64 files with memory maps: https://github.

Read more

item.title: React Flow, open source libraries for node-based UIs with React or Svelte
item.description:
React Flow · Svelte Flow · React Flow Pro · Discord The xyflow mono repo The xyflow repository is the home of four packages: React Flow 12 @xyflow/react packages/react React Flow 11 reactflow v11 branch Svelte Flow @xyflow/svelte packages/svelte Shared helper library @xyflow/system packages/system Commercial usage Are you using React Flow or Svelte Flow for a personal project. Getting started The best way to get started is to check out the React Flow or Svelte Flow learn section. License React Flow and Svelte Flow are MIT licensed.

Read more

item.title: AI discovers a 5x faster MoE load balancing algorithm than human experts
When is it better to think without words?
item.description:
When is it better to think without words. In the 1940s, when the French mathematician Jacques Hadamard asked good mathematicians how they came up with solutions to hard problems, they nearly universally answered that they didn’t think in words; neither did they think in images or equations. Wrestling with a problem helps you build a mental model of what you know and what you don’t—providing the subconscious with building blocks to work with.

Read more

item.title: Counter-Strike's player economy is in a multi-billion dollar freefall
item.description:
They can also be obtained through trading with other players and purchasing from Steam Community Market. Previously, Knives and Gloves could not be obtained through trade up contracts, exponentially increasing their value as highly sought-after items. Bloomberg reported the market for Counter-Strike cosmetic items dropped 25% overnight from Wednesday evening into Thursday morning.

Read more
